column4: Okay so. Gnash sucks, at least in Firefox. What are my alternatives?
flashplugin-nonfree ??
I can't find that in the Synaptic Package Manager...
did you enabled multiverse? also the flash 9 is in the seveas repo (multiverse has 7)
i'm pretty sure I did...
yeah in software sources I checked every box I could get my mouse on, including "Software restricted by copyright or legal issues (multiverse)"
it is there except if you are on amd64....
or ppc.... only fot ia32
I'm on a Sempron...
what says 'uname -m' ??
sorry but not flash for you :( go complain adobe ;)
gah.
no flash for me? that's it, nothing else?
there is no flash for 64 bits (even windows 64 bits iirc)
is it 64 bit?
so I have 64-bit Ubuntu??
yes
yikes, eww! gotta get it off!
I'll be back when I install 32-bit, I had no idea :)
you installed it.... sure you known what you were doing when you dl the amd64 iso image
i only have the first ubuntu 64 bits flash works ok
